articles.title: Louis Oosthuizen's stunning 52-foot eagle putt hands him share of US Open lead - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen closed with a stunning 52-foot eagle putt to grab a share of the lead with Canada's Mackenzie Hughes and American Russell Henley after the third round of the US Open.
articles.content: South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen closed with a stunning 52-foot eagle putt to grab a share of the lead with Canada's Mackenzie Hughes and American Russell Henley after Saturday's dramatic third round … [+6588 chars]

articles.title: Macy Gray Says “It’s Time” For A New American Flag That Represents “All Of Us” In Juneteenth Op-Ed - Deadline
